11.content: One day, I was walking on the street with my head down, I was feeling down, then I heard a voice "Are you feeling sad?", "No, I'm feeling down" I said, "Why would you come with me and I will help you" said a voice sound like a girl, "Ok" I said and I held my hand out then the girl hold me and I follow her to her place. After I went to her place, the girl ask me "Why are you feeling down?", "Because I don't have any friends" I said, "Well don't worry, I will be your friend, look up and look at the watch. What do you feel?" said the girl, "I feel... sleepy" I said then I'm getting very sleepy, "You can call me Peach, your Misstress" said Peach, "Yes Misstress Peach, you are my friend" I said, under Peach's power, "That's nice, my new friend, why would I see Daisy and show you, my new friend" said Peach, "Sounds good, Misstress Peach, Who is Daisy?" I said, confused, "You will see :)" said Peach.
11.title: The start of the Story (Peach)

111.content: "You know what my best friend, why would we call Daisy over?" Said Peach, "That sounds good, Misstress Peach" I asked, under Peach's power, "That's sweet" said Peach, then Peach use her cell phone to call Daisy over, "Hello?" said Daisy, "Hello, Daisy How are you?" said Peach, "Not bad at all" said Daisy "Why did you call me?", "Well I got something to show you, something awsome" said Peach, "Okay, I'll come over" said Daisy, and she hang up. When Daisy got here, she knocked on the door, "Hello, Daisy" said Peach, "Hey, Peach" said Daisy "So you want to show me something?", "That's right, want to come in?" said Peach, "Okay!" said Daisy, so Daisy went in and see me under Peach's control, "So? Do you like it?" said Peach, "Well yeah! But, what with this guy?" said Daisy, "Well, Daisy, he was feeling down because he don't have any friends, but I cheer him up by mind controling him to be a friend" said Peach, "Wow! That's very cool. have you command him to do anything?" said Daisy, "No! But I will show you" said Peach " My best friend, can you give Daisy a hug?", "Yes, Misstress Peach" I said and I give Daisy a hug to be kind to her, "Thanks, I wish I have someone to make me happy" said Daisy, "Hey, Daisy. Why would you and me make him our best friend?" Peach asked Daisy, "Yes, Oh Yes, Peach that is pretty sweet" said Daisy, "My best friend, you can now listen what me and Daisy have to say, you got it?" said Peach, "Yes, Misstress Peach" I said. Who will be first?
111.title: I meet Daisy

124.content:
Paula from the game Earthbound popped in, frying pan in hand. She was shorter than me but looked very angry.

"Who are you again?" I asked, just to be sure.

She slapped me with her pan. A bump began to form on my head.

"He isn't entierly under your power, Zelda! Use your magic more!"

Zelda strengthen the spell and I was render unable to speak.

Paula paced around the room, "I don't want to be in Ness's shadow! While he got all of those Super Smash Bros games, I was only a sticker! Imagine! Jeff got to be in it and Poo even lend Ness his PSI Starstorm! But me? No... Ness stole all my powers. Zelda, I want them back!"

"Now, now. I have a different thing in mind. I want to wed Link, but he keeps running away."

"No, Ness!"

"Link!"

Zelda and Paula went in the next room to argue. After awhile, they came out.

"I had reach an agreement." Zelda announced, "You will be-"
124.title: Paula

15533222222212222.content:
How's about Carl's marionette sister, Nirvana?

Imagine the irony... being the lowly puppet of a lowly puppet (an incredibly dangerous and overprotective lowly puppet but a lowly puppet nonetheless!)
15533222222212222.title: Bitter Irony

155332222222122221.content:
"Ugh.... man, this guy is heavy. Are you sure this is the one you want, sis?"

"Unnn.... ok, whatever big sis wants, big sis gets! I sure hope we didnt hurt him too bad, though..."

"Uh oh! C'mon! Let's...mm...let's move quick! I think I hear people coming!"

***************************************************************

How could this happen to you? You reflected upon your ignorance during your unconsciousness, hoping that this was all just one bad dream. Just moments ago, you were having a friendly casual stroll down the neighborhood in the middle of the night like you always do during the summer to cool yourself down. ...Then you had to come across HIM... the boy...

"Excuse me, mister..." the cute little blonde kid in a fancy blue uniform with a matching hat and glasses popped out of nowhere and asked you, "do you have the time?" Instead of doing the smart thing and questioning what a kid like him was doing out this late at night, you just smiled like an idiot and replied, "Sure kid, it's about half past midnight." You should have suspected something was up when you heard footsteps coming up from behind you.
"Um, I'm lost," the kid quickly changed the subject, "I was hoping you could uh... give me directions to the uh... library. I need to um... study for a quiz at school." Studying THIS late at night?! Libraries would be closed by now! That shoulda been a dead giveaway! But NOOOOOOOOO!!
"Alrighty, kid. Let's see... you take a left at Knaronville Road, keep going straight until you see the flower shop. Then you turn right and when you.... you...." It took you THIS long to realize the oddity. "Um, actually, aint it a little late for you be-AAUUGGHHH!!!" Before you could finish that sentence, a pair of long, hard, skinny metal arms wrapped around your neck tightly and began choking the life out of you! You struggled and squirmed, but to no avail. Your attack was far far stronger than you. You could only twitch and stare in horror at the little boy looking back at you showing no hint of surprise or shock as you slowly began to black out......

**************************************************************

"Ugghh... unnn......." Lord knows how long it's been since you were knocked out. Fortunately, you became to come to. Your neck's kinda aching, but it's good that youre still alive.
As your vision began to clear, the first thing you saw was an artificial feminine face staring down at you. A metal female face with no eyes and an odd-shaped blue hat with a big yellow earring over 'her' blonde hair! By the time you fully awoke, you noticed there was a rather tall girl mannequin in a blue dress with extremely long skinny arms lying on top of you, staring into your soul!

'Quite an odd looking doll,' you thought to yourself, 'what kind of clothing shop models THIS kind of wear?!' Your heart almost jumped out of it's chest the split second it's head began to tilt! It made a rattling sound with each movement the head made as it 'stared' down at you. The damn thing's alive!

"Oh good! Youre awake! We were worried for a moment!" that voice sounded familiar. Through the corner of your eye, you saw HIM... the boy in the fancy suit! The little brat who tricked you! "Geez, we thought we mighta overdid it earlier. You been out for hours!"
Your first course of action was to push the overgrown puppet off you and give the brat the third degree, but no matter how hard you tried, you couldnt move her off you. Or maybe SHE didnt wanna get off you!
You could see the kid start to snicker. "Heheheh... C'mon, sis. He wants up."

The puppet rattled her head again for a little while, then finally lifted her entire body up in the air with her long arms and flipped off of you and onto her feet! Quite an acrobatic little... whatever it is.
Anyway, with her off you, you got a look at your surroundings. You seem to be lying in the bed of some little hotel room. What room or what hotel? You have no clue. Alls you know is that judging by the view from the window, youre quite a lot of stories up! Ok... apparently it's a really really big hotel!
You rubbed your aching neck as you cleared your raspy throat. "W...where am I?"

"Oh, this is me and big sis's temporary place for the night," the boy answered as the puppet shook around, trying to balance her upper half, "guess we should introduce ourselves. I'm Carl. Carl Clover," he then points to the puppet, "and this is my sister, Ada." 'Ada', although her face was practically made to look that way, was staring at you funny as she continued balancing herself.
"G-Great..." was all you could say at the moment, cuz the life-size puppet was creeping you out.

"And you must be James!" your eyes widened when you heard Carl say that.
"H-HOW DO YOU KNOW MY NAME?!" you snapped. Carl just smiled carefreely, "Sis told me. She said she wants to play with you."
"W...why am I here?!" you finally asked, "What did you bring me over here for!"
"Um, I just said," Carl answered, "sis wants to play with you." ...Ada wants to play with you? "Sorry about earlier, but she said it was necessary that we had to use force. You'd probably run away if we didnt." A puppet who he claims is his sister was telling Carl things. Not a good sign. You can imagine scary movies starting out this way!

"Uh, look kid."
"It's Carl. Sis hates it when people call me a kid." Yikes.
"S-sorry!" you correct yourself, "anyway, Carl, I'm afraid I uh... dont have time to play around, so I'm gonna have to-" you flinched when Ada stepped up to you and bent her upper-half down to get a REAL good look at you!
"Sis says you cant leave yet," Carl translated his puppet sister, "she's come a long way to find you. It'd kill her if you stepped out now." She's come a long way to find you?! Why would a puppet be hunting you down?!

Speaking of which, you noticed the eye-spaces on Ada's face glowing red. For some reason, you couldnt help but stare into the red glows. No matter how hard you wanted to turn away from the eyes, your body wasnt capable of doing so. As you gazed into the puppet's eyes, you could feel strange vibes beginning to enter your mind. It's as if someone pried open a door to your thoughts and began entering them! Foreign thoughts began to cloud your mind! Thoughts that seemed to revolve around the name 'Nirvana' over and over. Something about obeying Nirvana. Submitting to Nirvana.

The next thought felt like an order you could not refuse to obey....
155332222222122221.title: Rape Me (...what?! It's the name of the song!)

1553322222221222211.content:
'...Tea... party....'

For some odd reason, you have the strangest craving for tea. You dont even like tea much and now all of a sudden you want it! Seriously, it feels as if you havent had tea in forever and you were desperately missing the taste on your tongue! Hot tea, iced tea, herbal tea, chai tea, green tea, Mr T, you didnt care WHAT tea! You just wanted tea NOW!

Could it have something to do with Ada's stare? Speaking of which, the puppet's eyes finally stopped glowing and you snapped out of your little trance.

"Uh... I'm feeling really thirsty. Do you have any tea?" you politely asked.

"What a coincidence!" the brat smiled, "sis just got through preparing some tea. Have some with us!" That's awful generous of them, but then again they did knock you out and kidnap you so the living doll could mess with your mind! Suffice to say, youre not gonna feel grateful any time soon.
You got up off the bed, still rubbing your aching neck as you followed Carl into the dining room... and SHE followed you from behind, no doubt were her artificial eyes burning a hole into the back of you. Thankfully, the overflowing thoughts of tea took your mind off the rattling puppet following behind you.

It wasnt a long walk to the dining room table with a teapot, a set of teacups, and a bowl full of cookies waiting for the three of you.
"Dont sit there," Carl told you before you were about to take a seat, "that's sis's seat!" Ada even leaned down at you and stared your direction. You could feel some sort of a threatening vibe coming from her! Not wanting to mess with the Siblings from Hell, you backed away and sat in another chair.
Since Carl was too short to reach over the table, he had to walk around it and pour the tea into your cup directly. "Enjoy!"
"Thanks," you muttered as you slowly took a sip... and squinted your face at how terrible it is! There's way too much sugar, the lemon's rotten, the teabag probably expired years ago, and the water mustve been poured from a toilet! This was honestly the worst tea you have ever tasted and will probably leave a bad taste in your mouth for a LOOOOOONNNGGG time! You fought back the urge to puke, yet for some reason you couldnt stop drinking it! You were compelled to finish it 'till to the last drop!

It was unbelievable that Carl was drinking his cup without any problems. Ada even poured her cup toward her mouth, only to spill it down her dress.
"It's.... good," you forced yourself to say.
"How about a cookie to wash it down?" the kid offered. Just when you were about to say you lost your appetite, you noticed the puppet's eyes glowing again and your mind started to fill up with the words 'Nirvana' and 'Cookies'!
"I would.... love... some cookies..." you answered in a hypnotic state! You quickly snaked one out of the bowl and took several bites out of it. After swallowing the last bite down, you grabbed another cookie and chowed down on it! Then you gulped down another without even bothering to chew! Thankfully you still had some godawful tea left to wash it down! At least the cookies didnt taste nearly as bad.

"Hey sis, turn on the radio," Carl said to the puppet whom quickly obliged. She flipped the dial on the radio and the news came on..
"*KRSSHH!* -a type of weaponry unit codename: Nirvana, is considered armed, fully functional, and extremely dangerous," you overhear the anchor, "it is often seen accompanied by a former military youth who answers to the name, Carl Clover posing as it's brother." You tried not to show off your absolute shock when you heard the anchorman say that! Oh dear lord, is he talking about the very same two that are holding you captive?! "Take extreme caution. If found, do not engage directly. Contact local authorities immediately. Repeat-"

No wonder these two were giving off bad vibes! The polite brat and the killer puppet-robot are most wanted criminals! What would a robot, designed for the sole purpose of killing, want with you? Did you unintentionally piss off her creator or something? Did somebody program her to hunt you down?! And if she wants you so bad, why didnt she just kill you yet?! She could easily reach over and break your neck with those long metal arms of hers!

"I dont like this station. Could you change it?" Carl asked Ada/Nirvana as you shivered, pretending to sip your empty cup. The puppet flipped the dial again...
"KRSST!! 80 degrees outside- *TSSKK* That's right! We got all the hardware in one place-*PPSSSTTT* La robusteza del asesino-*TRRRKKK!*A MULATTO... AN ALBINO... A MOSQUITO... A LIBIDO...*PRRSSTT!* Ooh baby I love your way... every day, yeah e yeah!" Killer Robot Nirvana finally stopped at a nice calm and relaxing reggae tune. Why she stopped there is anyone's guess.
But it sounded nice and peaceful enough... if you werent scared for your life, you'd almost lose yourself to the beat.

...Oh god, she turned her head over to you again! No matter how badly you wanted to, you could not turn away from the red glows in her eyes! She's controlling her mind again!
What's the next order you hear in your head?
1553322222221222211.title: Leaving a BAD taste in your mouth

155332222222222221222221.content:
I was having a walk one day, until I found something very strange, a large beehive, "What the?" I said. I went inside and found some characters I heard of, but they dress different and then two girls came straight at me, "Come with us" said one. "Why?" I said. "Because our misstress wants to see you" said the other. "I don't think I want to" I said and walk away slowly and then one of the girls stab me and I fade out.

After I fade out. I woke up and look around, my hands and feet are stuck which can't make me move. What's going on?" I yelled as loud as I can and the same two girls I saw caome right to me with there misstress. "Well, well, well. What do we got here?" said the Misstress. "Someone who don't get any respect!" I said in an angry tone. "What do we do to him, misstress Q-Bee?" said one of the girls. "Well, let's just give him a rest" said Q-Bee and then the honey move close to my face an cover my face but not the eyes and I'm getting sleepy and sleepy. Then Q-Bee...
155332222222222221222221.title: Found something strange
